Posts.Content: my mum has 3 brain tumours - this is secondary after breast cancer. she is now immobile, and sleeps alot. She has just been taken to hospital due to fluid in her lungs - i live in another country - its a long way from home. If anyone has been through this - is it near the end?
Posts.Title: is it near the end for my mum?

Posts.Content: Have the answer, not good. Cancer has spread again....... To lungs. Nothing they can do. Good luck to you all fighting keep going. Stay strong
Posts.Title: is it near the end for my mum?
